lines: 1. Ir' obogima bwane,Bochene bob'obwao,Ir' amaboko naro,'kore bun'origetie,'Kore bun'origetie.
2. Ira amagor'ane,'B' amang' as' emeremo,Ira n'eriogi riane,Nter'ase Nyasae oka,Nter'ase Nyasae oka.
3. Ir' ebikoba biane,Bikwan' ay' ar' ayao,Ir' amo n'echinibo,Tindigetie kobisa,Tindigetie kobisa.
4. Ira chingaki chiane,chikobake botambe,Ir' obong'aini bwane,korer' ay' origetie,Korer' ay' origetie.
5. Ira Ogwancha kwane,Gokore kob'okwao,Ira n'enkoro yane,Eb' obomenyo bwao,Eb' obomenyo bwao.
6. Ir' obwanchani bwane,Nib'as' amagor'aoIr' omobere bwensi,noyoo bono bori,Noyoo bono bori.
